messages.subject: organizing (desperate cry for kick in the behind)
messages.msgSnippet: ... tidy enough today, that I can now get back to a regular cleaning (mopping, dusting) schedule and not avoid it because of the disorganization. What a
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>>>>So I am proud to say that everything is
tidy enough today, that I
can now get back to a regular "cleaning" (mopping,
dusting) schedule
and not avoid it because of the disorganization.

What a releif! It's amazing what reading a post from a
stranger can
do for motivation! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>

Tracey, you made my day. I'm so glad my suggestion
worked for you. I've been there! sometimes I just
cover up boxes with attractive cloths and burn insence
on top of them. it works!
Anna
